subject: World Cup 2010 (Soccer)
Soccer
Music
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: The beelike drone of the vuvuzela is drowning out one of the joys of the World Cup: the musical Brazilians and their samba bands.
snippet: The beelike drone of the vuvuzela is drowning out one of the joys of the World Cup: the musical Brazilians and their samba bands.
